issue.title: [CF 756] Spell in range of unit bugging
issue.body:
I'm using r710 and all of my icons using the condition "Spell in range of unit" are experiencing extreme delays/misfires.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #756 | Raw

> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

OK, I'll take a look when I get home. I probably broke something again with the condition event system when I fixed the bug that was affecting the ....

WAIT. I know what I did. It definitely was a side effect from when I fixed the event system for the bug that was afflicting the Talent Learned condition. Basically, the condition set for the first icon here is using the events for when you rage changes and isn't looking at the fact that SPELLRANGE doesn't have any events (which should make the condition set be on update driven, but I removed the code to make that happen).

I will make an untested commit with the fix in a few minutes. Let me know if it works or not.

Edited Feb 21, 2013
